data.name: Territory Control 2
data.detailed_description:
A 2D multiplayer sandbox combining faction-based gameplay with industry,
base building and RPG elements, featuring all sorts of joy such as...

Destruction! - ruining the environment with...

  • All kinds of explosives!
  • Heavy-duty mining equipment!
  • Industrial accidents!
  • Trench warfare and artillery!

Engineering! - saving the day by...

  • Dragging your alcoholic friend out of a ditch with a winch!
  • Modifying a revolver to accept machine gun ammunition!
  • Transporting heavy equipment with a crane!
  • Spinning a windmill with a steam engine!
  • Mass-producing extremely flimsy (but cheap) rifles!

Multiplayer! - exploiting your friends to...

  • Fight for your faction using your extremely flimsy (but cheap) rifles!
  • Build enormous masonry spanning the entire map!
  • Establish a police state and take control of other players' lives!
  • Operate heavy machinery and strip the entire map of all natural resources!
  • Provide mechanical power to your ore-processing setup by turning a hand crank!

data.short_description: A 2D multiplayer sandbox game revolving around industry, innovation, factions, combat and emergent gameplay. Design factories, customize tools and weapons, fight or trade with other players or get viciously murdered by an angry badger.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 and higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 and higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
